livegrep

Fast, regular expression code search service
git clone https://source.static.kevinlin.info/external/livegrep.git

      1 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
      2 <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/">
      3     <ShortName>{{ .BackendName }} livegrep</ShortName>
      4     <Description>
      5       Interactively search source code using regular expressions, with
      6       results as-you-type.
      7     </Description>
      8     <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>
      9     <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>
     10     <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>
     11     <Language>en-us</Language>
     12     <Developer>Nelson Elhage</Developer>
     13     <Contact>nelhage@nelhage.com</Contact>
     14     <Query role="example" searchTerms="printf\("/>
     15     <Url type="text/html" template="{{ .BaseURL }}search/?q={searchTerms}"/>
     16 </OpenSearchDescription>
